item.title: Switch to Systemd From Grub
item.description: I have two efi partitions, p1 for windows and p4 for Arch sudo fdisk -l Add the efi entry in /etc/fstab get the UUID from sudo blkid Mount the /efi sudo mount /efi && ls /efi The structure would look something like Install ucode for my amd machine it is sudo pacman -S amd-ucode Reinstall linux kernel sudo pacman -S linux linux-headers mkinitcpio -P Add the following in sudo nano /efi/loader/entries/arch.
